did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Records of the Vice President for Land Grant Affairs, 1957-1980.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University.Vice President for Land Grant Affairs.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Files of Constance E. Cook as Cornell's Vice President for Land Grant Affairs include records of special events; budgets, salaries, audits, and other financial records; personnel; buildings; State University of New York; statutory colleges at Cornell; and reports, correspondence, and related records.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Files of Constance E. Cook as Cornell's Vice President for Land Grant Affairs include records of special events; budgets, salaries, audits, and other financial records; personnel; buildings; State University of New York; statutory colleges at Cornell; and reports, correspondence, and related records.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Restricted to permission of office of origin.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Records of the Vice President for Land Grant Affairs, #4-11-1807. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
